website_summaries.verdict: Outdoes the competition with generous insulation, earth-friendly materials and a spacious, well-protected interior. Add in ease of maintenance, and that's why we deem it the "best of the best".
pros: Well-insulated, with bedding and heating options for outdoor and feral cats
Will hold multiple cats, including mothers-to-be
cons: No second escape door, but that is by design
Does not accommodate every kind of electric heating pad cord

customer_reviews.title: He is safe and warm and best of all I can rest easy knowing he has ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little feral cat loves this house. He is safe and warm and best of all I can rest easy knowing he has a dry place to sleep. He is in it always!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: How to Use with Feral Cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my feral cats (a mother and two grown kittens). I've had it for a year, but they wouldn't go in it. So, last year when the temperature dropped to freezing, I brought it onto my porch, took the top off, turned it on it's side, and extended it with a dog blanket. I block the door with cardboard and prop a chair against it to keep it from rolling. On cold nights, all three of my feral cats make use of this "nest." It was only in the 40's last night, but all three were there when I went to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Viki Annand

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Maternity Ward
customer_reviews.text: The Kitty Tube arrived just a day before our momma cat went into labor. She immediately took to the Kitty Tube and it is now home to her and her four kittens. I love being able to look into their home to see the new ones without reaching my arm in and disturbing everyone. It snowed May 1, just a day after the new kittens were born and everyone is staying warm and dry. So glad I found this new home for my cats and we were able to watch the birth of the new kittens without disturbing momma.
customer_reviews.author: KiminSux

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Tube Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kitty Tube and so do my cats. I have two of each. Well worth the cost for cold winter nights. In the photos Slippers enjoys the Kitty Tube inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic home for the outdoor cat that adopted us
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic home for the outdoor cat that adopted us. I set the house up on the coverd stoop, and subsequently ordered the heater. We are in the midst of blizzard 2015 and look who was taosty and cozy this morning. I did get the cushion, and I will be looking for straw ( not hay) when I can...and save the cushion for drier weather
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.

customer_reviews.title: 🙂. THANK YOU, KITTY TUBE!  🙂
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST CAT HOUSE, FOR YOUR MONEY, however I've had to CLOSE THE VENTS, during the thunderstorm, and secured the Door Gasket, with Electrical Tape, however Momma JESSI and her NEW LITTER are 100% Safe. 😊
customer_reviews.author: KSOL

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not one cat outside would use it. Traded it for a small cat enclosure with an entrance and an exit from a volunteer with the cat rescue we work with. Maybe he has better luck.
customer_reviews.author: cat-lady-conowingo

customer_reviews.title: Great cat shelter
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered The Kitty Tube on two separate occasions. The Kitty Tube is built well, easily assembled, and given a week without any of my "help" (any cat owner knows that "helping" a cat is usually counterproductive and a total waste of time), two male cats have figured out that these things are cozy places to be. The first The Kitty Tube is kept on a back porch and the second The Kitty Tube is kept in the garage with a 40 watt heated pad under the washable cat bed that came with The Kitty Tube. Two thumbs up for The Kitty Tube!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: My Cats LOVE This
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this cat house (esp. in the winter). I have ferrel cats that run wild around my home and they love this cat house too! I am thinking about ordering one or two more because of the number of cats that come to my house. My only dislike is that I feel like the padding on the inside is not enough insulation on very cold winter days. I feel like ordering more insulation padding just to keep the cats warmer and more snug. The cats love this house though and seem to feel safe and comfortable in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Being able to easily remove the lid to do so is a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: This may seem a little pricey for a cat house but trust me it is worth every penny. I put clean towels in for my outdoor cat every few weeks, especially in wet weather. Being able to easily remove the lid to do so is a huge plus. I have a custom wooden house for my other outdoor cat that I paid $300 for but I prefer this one and so does my cat. The perfect size. I also have the heated bed that is made for this kitty home and it keeps my cat warm in the cold Wisconsin winters. A great product at a reasonable price. Quality, heave duty and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: scondia

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The consistent five-star reviews are well-deserved; this is a GREAT product! The build quality was excellent: the unit is heavier than I had expected and the insulation is substantial and well made. I had already had an indoor/outdoor heating pad (, which fit perfectly on the top. I purchased another unit for the inside (, which fit perfectly inside of the bed that came with the unit. I purchased this for my Yard Cat who, because of his FLV status, cannot live inside with the rest of my herd. While Yard and I would both prefer it if he could live inside, at least neither one of us have to worry about him getting cold at night!
customer_reviews.author: Doomandgloom

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years, it's still working well!
customer_reviews.text: At first my two cats didn't like this house. However, I took the awning off of the front of it, and elevated it. Now they love it! I am not sure what it was about the awning they didn't like, but hey cats are weird sometimes. This is their "day house" that stays on my porch. I elevated it on a cute wooden table and covered the landing with interchangeable carpet. I like that the vents are adjustable so that this works as a cool down spot in the summer, but is warm and toasty in the winter. I have had this about 2 years, and it is still holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately the best Cat house you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing is huge and it's expensive. But i have very gusty winds in the afternoon, and looking at some of the other cat houses they look like they would all end up in the neighbors yard. This thing is so awesome, and my cat has taken to it very well. I live in california, so i don't think i have to worry about the condensation problems that others have been having. I did put a brick on it to make sure it doesn't go anywhere though, but so far it's doing it's job.. and looks good in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Morgas

customer_reviews.title: My ferals love kitty tube!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tube for 2 good sized feral cats. I always worried about them during freezing ohio winters & have been looking for the right product to keep them safe -dry & warm. Like others I was concerned that kittytube had only 1 door but after talking to their knowledgeable staff I could understand their concept. It took some time for my ferals to get used to it & for that reason I would suggest purchasing before the really cold temps hit (At least for ferals so there is time for them to get used to it.) I also purchased the heating pad & now my cats love & are in their kitty tube every cold nite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Kitty Tube was the perfect answer! It is insulated from top to bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Took in two tossed out kitties recently. My husband built them a shelter that worked for a bit but, as the colder temps approached, I was concerned they wouldn't have enough protection from the cold. The Kitty Tube was the perfect answer! It is insulated from top to bottom and in its circular form. They are well protected from the elements and cozy snuggling together. I bought an additional heat reflective mat to provide additional warmth that I placed on top of the mat already provided. They are in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: FlyJ

customer_reviews.title: it is an awesome product and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is an awesome product and very well made. Unfortunately, our siamese cross kitty refuses to go into it. Since we can't have indoor cats due to allergies, we will hang on to it. Maybe some future kitty of ours will appreciate it more. Update! We had to take the lid off for him. We keep it on the covered porch, so rain isn't an issue. It isn't as warm and protective as it would be with the lid, but at least now he will go in! It's still good protection from the wind, and we put a warming pad in there to help with the cold. He uses it every night now.
customer_reviews.author: labdesigner

customer_reviews.title: Our two cats won’t leave it!
customer_reviews.text: Both our 10 pound and 15 pound outdoor cats LOVE this. They haven’t left it since we put them both in 5 hours ago. We moved from the South to the far North and our Southern cats needed a warm place to escape the snow and freezing temperatures. This was perfect! Don’t waste your money on anything else, if you live in a snowy cold climate. And no predator can fit their heads in the front entry hole, either!
customer_reviews.author: B7827

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 outdoor cats. This product is amazing! I purchased one initially to see if one or all would sleep inside. One took it over immediately so I purchased another. I will be purchasing a third this week. Gives me peace of mind my furry friends will be cozy and warm even when the weather turns cold. The insulated liner really makes this a first class purchase for outdoor pets. Kudos for having a product like this. Now I never have to worry if my cats have a safe, warm place to sleep during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: now when i first put it together i let my inside cat see it and she loved it inside the house but the feral cat outside
customer_reviews.text: My feral cat outside would never get in it.. scared i guess of being enclosed by only one entrance or exit. now when i first put it together i let my inside cat see it and she loved it inside the house but the feral cat outside.. NOPE.. she has stuck her head in it but never gone inside it. I have her another cozy larger opening bed beside the kitty tube and she likes the other bed better. had heat pads in both beds so she made it good thru the winter without the large kitty tube. Maybe someday she will check it out or i just wasted a bunch of money on the tube
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: 27lb of happy cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats who love to be outdoors all year round including the harsh Canadian winter. They generally dont like to share spaces but i was surprised to find both of them happily sharing the cat house. My first cat is 20lbs (he isnt fat he is just a big cat), and he has no problem getting in or out, the second cat is 7lbs. We have no extra heating in the house and it seems to work well. The only thing that i was surprised by was the size, its massive! Imagine 3 stacked 4x4 car tires!! I bought the cushion option but will probably use straw as well this winter
customer_reviews.author: Captain Solo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but I love it. 9-12-18 Updated Just purchased my 4th Kitty Tube and the only one I've had problems with. The handles will not stay seated in the lid so I had to use w/out them initially. I had someone else help me yesterday to hold them in place while we tried to put the lid on the tube which was nearly impossible. We did get the lid on however it is so tight it takes 2 people to spin the lid so I can set the vent holes properly for the cat. I love your product but this one has been a lot of trouble and very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Not so weatherproof!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I did something wrong, but after the first rainstorm, everything was soaking wet!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Linderman

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic find in 2013 for 1 absolutely beautiful clawless cat
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic find in 2013 for 1 absolutely beautiful clawless cat. Mama kiitty is back with 3 kittens and I just ordered another so babies and Mama can reside after all are trapped and taken to get "fixed". Last year Mama left 3 babies in my care as soon as they were weaned. (3) boys were socialized enough after their surgery to be adopted by a single owner. Yay This year Mama hasn't left them and I'm hopeful we can get her and the babies to the Vet.
customer_reviews.author: mzmuffy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the feral cats around the house this past winter and they loved it! We keep them outside under the overhang of our shed near their food and they seem content. Well insulated also.
customer_reviews.author: Carolshmarol

customer_reviews.title: could stand a little more insulation.
customer_reviews.text: It's good but not warm enough for winter. I bought house insulation that was in plastic, cut it to fit the lid, bottom and around. Taped the edges so the strays wouldn't get hurt by whatever the insulation is. I put it in first then added their foam on top of it so that's the part that the cats come in contact with. Yes that cuts down the size of it but only one stray will use it at a time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Second one we've had and both leak from the top. Soaking wet inside. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davis

customer_reviews.title: seems leak
customer_reviews.text: Owned mine for a couple of years. I have it built up with a wooden base underneath. I've duct taped the seams but I constantly have to change and wash the bedding because its getting wet from the bottom up. I 'm not sure how the moisture gets in but it does -always! We have very wet weather in NJ - Fall/Winter and Spring. Cannot seem to keep things dry inside. For the cost I am a bit disappointed because it requires a lot of laundry and changing bedding to keep things warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: mr each

customer_reviews.title: Will buy a second one soon!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this house. It didn't take long for our outdoor catguy to make it his. We got the pillow with it and it fits perfect. It is super easy to clean. Two cats could easily fit inside. It will snow tonight here in Tidewater Virginia and I can sleep well knowing my guy is cozy and warm (he just won't come in our house!). It is a large enough space for him to have food and water in it with him. I will get a second one to keep on the back deck for my mainly indoor cats who on occasion insist on staying out all night!
customer_reviews.author: WIlsonKahlbaum

customer_reviews.title: This is our 2nd Outdoor "Kitty Tube. " We ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Outdoor "Kitty Tube." We have adopted several "left behind" pets from foreclosed homes. Our oldest left-behind is at least 10 yrs old and probably older. In the coldest days 10 to 20 degrees F, our outside cats were warm and safe. The optional heating pad work well with several small flannel blankets for the cats to snuggle into. You cannot stand on these Kitty Tubes, and I've seen kids try - the rounded top & corners help keep the little ones off of the cat's home. When we brought one of our outside cats inside, we got a new Kitty Tube for inside during the transition. It will go outside as soon as "all-is-well!"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kitty tubes needs two openings.
customer_reviews.text: I love the kitty tube. I would give it a 5 star but my outdoor cats need an escape opening as well, encase they encounter a predator. I would purchase more kitty tubes if they had two openings. I would pay extra for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend elevating it on cinder blocks or something similar(and stable) ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. Product as described..my indoor cats promptly went inside but when I put the awning on, they would not enter it. I purchased it for my ferals and it will be going outside for them..It beats the wood doghouse w/ straw I had been using by a mile..I may have to purchase another Kitty Tube.I would definitely recommend elevating it on cinder blocks or something similar(and stable) to get it up off the ground. The creators of this item did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amozon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I have a large feral cat colony ...
customer_reviews.text: I placed this order late at night and the company shipped it first thing in the morning! I love these. I have a large feral cat colony that I care for and I have 9 placed all over. The cats use them (they don't share) and they have alleviated much stress for me - I don't worry as much about bitterly cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Katiescats

customer_reviews.title: It is so well insulated great in the hot summer heat and in the coldest ...
customer_reviews.text: After making several feral cat boxed over the years I finally bought the kitty tube. It is so well insulated great in the hot summer heat and in the coldest of winter. 2-3 cats can easily fit and the opening is small so dogs cannot reach them. After nearly a year the product still looks brand new. No fading. I really wish anyone caring for outside cats whether pets or feral would get this product it is truly worth every penny. I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Weather proof, easy access to clean or check inside and easy to hose out if necessary
customer_reviews.text: I have three of the kitty tubes. I heat two but leave one without heat so cats have choice. They keep improving this product such as the awning, plastic door flap (mine is cut into strips and not a solid piece of plastic so cat might feel less anxious about entering). Also one of my newer tubes has an extra insulated piece that sits on inside top, it has some issues with curling and not sitting flat but does add extra insulation. There is no back door for escape from predators or other cats trying to enter like my other heated houses (they have 4 sides and roof but not as weather proof, I keep them under protected spaces).
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schuster-Woodard

customer_reviews.title: I sleep better knowing our community cat is safe and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hut! Our community cat loves it as well and it's worth every penny. We got the double insulation to make sure she is warm in the coldest of nights-- we use the pad most of the year but in the winter add straw just to ensure she has all possible options for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Tube
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my porch so if in the event one of my cats gets out and has to wait to get back in, then they have a warm, dry place to hang out. It's built very well and is water proof and warm in the cold. They seem to like it and it doesn't look out of place on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Livingston-Spencer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - LOVE - LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and my (4) outside cats absolutely LOVE IT! The insulated part is what makes it such a GREAT thing for outside cats. The 'critter proof' opening is just perfect! The quality is GREAT; tough and strong but very easy to assemble. I didn't purchase the extra insulating kit because I wouldn't need it in my area but there is such good insulation just as it is, that I wouldn't think you would need the extra unless you lived in a VERY, VERY cold area.
customer_reviews.author: Jerre Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves his cave! I bought it so that he can stay warm outside on cold winter nights. I live in Montana where it gets very cold at night. It is still early in the cold season, so I am not sure how well it will hold heat when temps get down into the single digits or less. I have bought two large heating pads to put in there, and it seems to stay warm enough. If it doesn't hold up in the dead of winter, I will have kitty inside the house. He likes to spend time in his kitty tube though!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Olivas

customer_reviews.title: but I really love it! I love having the ability to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about spending this much money for a shelter for the stray cat in the neighborhood, but I really love it! I love having the ability to have the heated pad underneath that is designed to be outdoors. This is durable and great shelter for any outdoor animal that is not too large; it is built for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and warm in winter.
customer_reviews.text: We started looking after a stray that visits our house. We bought this for him to be comfortable in the winter. It worked really well. He seemed to enjoy it. It’s very sturdy, the insulation keeps it warm, and the little cushion doesn’t stay wet. It might be too warm for him in the summer. Now he sleeps on our deck next to the glass door.
customer_reviews.author: Weimarner

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great place for our feral cats to live in. Seen some yellow fur inside and so we know that one is sleeping in a warm and safe place. The only thing that I have to say is that it comes delivered to you in a very large box. It is so great that I think I will order 2 more this coming summer. Love this home for them!
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for some of the stray cats that the previous owner abandoned when he sold his house next door. Not having the heart to take them to animal control, I adopted them as outdoor cats. This unit is really outstanding. It is exceptionally well made, extremely sturdy, and well insulated. The optional heating pad was the perfect accessory for the upcoming winter. Shipping was super fast! The cats love their new home as I can see them through the small door (another plus to keep the coldness out) cuddled up together. I will be ordering another one for my own cats as well when I let them out for some fresh air during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looking forward to my feral cat to make her winter home in it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, our shop cat lives in the caves in back of our school and this year thought I would give her the choice of a different winter home when the drifts come. She has been here for 7 years and doing fine, she won't let us near her but we feed her daily and she is family to us. I put this in the shed in back of our shop and will see if she takes to it. Don't hesitate if you have a feral or any outdoor animal, it is top of the line for outdoor cats!!! Will let you know when I see her come walking out of it on a cold winter day!
customer_reviews.author: Decorator Diva

customer_reviews.title: Love the Kitty Tube
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Kitty Tube. I've been caring for a stray cat for a week or so - weather now getting cold and we have a lot of coyotes in our area. This product is designed to be safe from predators and is very well insulated to keep kitty warm and secure. Also the instructional video was extremely helpful and made installing the awning and screen door simple. This product is made in the USA - high quality and well-made. I highly recommend the Kitty Tube for anyone caring for outdoor cats.
customer_reviews.author: Marion J. Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor kitty house!
customer_reviews.text: loved ease of putting together,....I have three feral cats that seemed to have adopted me...they went right into house...large and roomy..3 fit into it comfortably....loved so much ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Semi-feral Cats upon relocation chose this hidey-hole--buying a third
customer_reviews.text: We moved Mom with Alzheimer's in with us. We are now mightily trying to relocate to our beach house her two 15-year-old semi-feral cats. They seem to like this Kitty Tube so we have ordered another so that each cat can have one to herself. I like that we can open the top and look in or clean out easily. Update: The semi-feral cats have voted with their paws and they prefer the Kitty Tubes to the cardboard boxes, plastic crates, etc. Thus, I am ordering a 3rd Kitty Tube. We plan to position them around our 1.5 acre property so that we can figure out where these 2 relocated semi-feral cats will choose to sleep and be fed.
customer_reviews.author: LIAnne

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Although not very attractive looking, this is an awesome, functional, safe, and warm home for your kitties. I bought it with the extra layer of insulation and feel so good knowing the family of wild kitties I've adopted are safe and warm on cold rainy and snowy nights. It is durable, and roomy. It will fit at least three cats, maybe four if they're not too big. It has a nice small entry to ensure safety and protection from larger animals. Watch the video on this item and you will be sold. It's a bit pricey, but your kitties will appreciate your generosity. They deserve your protection!
customer_reviews.author: tammy lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the stray cat I have around my house. With the cooler temperatures coming, in Ohio, this will be perfect. It took only a few days for her to know what it was and now she's in there all the time, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: CRI

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this outdoor house
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little house for a couple of cats that showed up on our doorstep. They're not tame, even though we've tried to tame them. (We even had them spayed and vaccinated). I was surprised to see how much insulation is provided in this little house. The padding that comes with it is nice as well. One of the kitties is already using it. It seems to be keeping her warm, and she seems to really like it. Since we can't seem to get the kitties tame enough to make them inside cats, I'm grateful for this insulated outdoor house to keep them warm and dry. I would recommend this little house for anyone with an outside house.
customer_reviews.author: tailor_made

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!!!!! for your cat, multiple cats or a small dog!!
customer_reviews.text: Who ever wrote that one star review obviously didn't try and contact the company for help. They would have made it right immediately. They PERSONALLY called me and asked about our experience and why we liked it! It is the smartest thing on the market for keeping cats or small dogs warm and cozy outside under an awning or something to keep the rain out of the door!!!! Thank you Kitty tube for coming up with this. Now if we could just get the word out to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: TINK

customer_reviews.title: kitty tube + kitty heat pad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the outdoor cat during this freezing winter. With record colds this winter I ordered this to help keep my cat warm. The kitty tube is huge and, with the addition of buying the companies heating pad, my cat can now always be found in his new house. The heating pad is very low heat and I don't needs to worry about a cat house fire. The cat didn't seem to love it to much until I added the heating pad so I think the added warmth gave the extra nudge needed.
customer_reviews.author: bookwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Virtually Weather proof!
customer_reviews.text: Solid option for outdoor kitty. Warm in winter, wind proof, keeps rain out if exposed, doesn't leak, has option for increased insulation if you live in colder areas, and you can easily place a warming pad in it w/o compromising the weather protection.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jamie

customer_reviews.title: they used it and love it. We are now going into fall and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during an unusually cold Texas winter last year for two semi-feral cats who live in my backyard. I wasn't sure they would use it because anything new tends to freak them out, but once they realized it wasn't a monster out to destroy them, they used it and love it. We are now going into fall and neither had been inside since the weather started warming up. A few weeks ago, we had a little cool spell and I saw one of the cats inside early one morning, so they know when it's cold, get inside. Well worth the money and am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda in TX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Reliable Kittytube
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple of feral kitties in our new neighborhood and we live in Connecticut. I worry about their welfare, but didn't want to purchase something that would fly around the yard during inclement weather. The Kittytube arrived fast and seems sturdy enough to withstand cold, rough weather. It's January now, and one of the kitties is using it! Thank goodness. This product may seem expensive but if you purchase something cheaper you'll just end up buying another one sooner when it breaks down. This one seems to be a keeper! Suzanne in CT
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Urban

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: By nature, cats love to curl up in a ball (circular) and the structure of the Kitty Tube is a perfect fit. It keeps the cold and rain out and provides a comfortable and safe place for our feral friends. You can easily remove the top for cleaning when needed. It's dark, round structure easily fits into our landscape without being an eyesore. We are very pleased with this purchase and would recommend this product to anyone looking for an efficient, outdoor home for a feral cat. They sell a heated pad for this tube which I will be purchasing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of the 2 cats will love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shelter for my 2 elderly cats for the winter. As yes, I bought other accessories for the shelter.....and it keeps the inside warm at night. My cats tend to go use the restroom outside first, then bolt inside their home for shelter. As YES, this is expensive but this will keep your felines warm when you work.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Noyola

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitty house!
customer_reviews.text: I've been caring for a small feral kitty for over a year. I had an electric, heated cat house that she used last winter, but for some reason, she won't use it this year. This house arrived yesterday with nothing required to do but put the little awning on and plug the hole that was for electricl plugs. The house is heavy and very good quality. There is nice insolation in the house and a very nice pillow inside. I couldn't tell if Bootsie used it last night but I didn't see her nesting in the leaves like she has been doing. She certainly was curious when I put it outside.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Tube is a HIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kitty Tube about a month ago and couldn't be happier. I have 2 outdoor cats that live in my screened-in porch, after spending way too much money on cat beds at the local pet supply store, I found this product on Amazon. My girls liked it from the start, they spend long periods of time in their Kitty Tube (especially when is cold and rainy). I finally have peace of mind knowing they won't freeze to death, get frostbite, or simply get sick, and I don't have to put them in the garage every time it gets cold outside, since it stays pretty warm and cozy inside their "tube". A+
customer_reviews.author: bevperu

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: These are great...my kitty colony loves them. I bought a heating pad to add it. Keeps my ferils safe and warm. They should last a long time. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor (or garage) cat accomodation
customer_reviews.text: As described. I did learn that in a heavy downpour rain will still get into the entrance, which I guess shouldn't be too surprising given that it was sitting on a wooden deck. I was able to prevent that by turning the entrance to face towards the house. Cat started to use quickly which was nice as he's a fussy one about where he'll sleep. Haven't tried the heating pad yet as we received it in June!
customer_reviews.author: Dan T. Man

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Colony loves them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Kitty Tube. I love them and so do my stray cats. Only problem I have is putting the cover on the opening. Out of 5 I could only get 1 on. I don't have the strength in my hands to push them in. So I just turn the openings toward the house and keep them on my covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS HIMMELBERGER

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is much larger than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is much larger than I expected. I am sure hoping my little semi-feral will use it, but she seems very, very leery of the single entrance. She's been poking her head in and checking it out, but so far no go. I did spray some Feliway in it and added a blanket she has been sleeping on...so hopefully she will realize it is a 'safe place' to take shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept with one major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the lid make it nearly impossible to take the lid on and off and one of mine broke the first time I tried to take the lid off! So I took them both off and cover the vents when it rains. The inside stays dry and seems to maintain enough warmth during the Northern California winter. The issue with the vent handles is the only thing that kept me from giving this product 5 stars but you have to be able to easily take the lid off and put it back on!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: my two cats use it
customer_reviews.text: The tube is well made and sturdy. It also has a good ventilation system. The pillow that I bought it with got mangled during washing and drying, that's why 4 stars. It is a bit pricey, but my two cats have been using it, so it serves the purpose. I did also get an insulated dog house for them, and the older female prefers the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub Sieron

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: A little stray cat began frequenting my deck. I was worried about her being in the elements of Wyoming so I began looking for solutions that would work for her. I didn't know if she would go in it but after putting her little rug on top of the heater, she knew it was for her. She is in it most of the time, even when it is not chilly. Nice solution when your spouse doesn't want a house pet but you want to offer shelter. Although the pillow is nice, she prefers a rug that she was used to.
customer_reviews.author: DNO

customer_reviews.title: It saves lives!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Winter is a very stressful time. The creatures need our help. We do everything in our power to aid them. This product improves the quality of life for our creature friends in extreme weather. It saves lives!! I am thrilled to have it at my home (times 2) for the creatures who have decided to live in my yard. Creatures discarded by others- and loved and cared for by our family, THANKS to fabulous products like this one! GREAT JOB, KITTY TUBE! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Linda King

customer_reviews.title: Warm and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I am exceptionally pleased with this purchase! Shipping was prompt and the product itself is really wonderful. When I placed the order I was afraid the cat house wouldn't be big enough for my 2 cats after they put on their winter weight. But now that they've both checked the house out, I can see that it's easily big enough for 3 cats. Both of my cats love the house and took to it on the first night I put it on my porch. The pillow inside is of great quality and the insulation should keep my felines warm through the winter. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JessW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered on 01Jan and was on our door step 05Jan. I also ordered the K&H Lectro-Soft Igloo Style heater pad instead of the type sold for Kitty tube. The K&H pad has not arrived yet. However, this appears to be VERY well insulated, and it is not the doubled insulated model. Tonight it is supposed to be going down to 7 degrees in this part of VA and I do not think the heating pad is going to be needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scarbrough

customer_reviews.title: So impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and have to say I am so very pleased with this! It's clear a lot of thought went into the design and making. Our outdoor kitties are getting up in age and I knew they could use a bit of extra protection from the elements and this looks to be as good as it can get for them! Thank you for making such a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. All 4 of the cats in my yard will cuddle up in it. The straw that came with it was nasty, old stuff. But yeah, just use straw for outside cats.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAT SHELTER EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: "This is the BEST CAT SHELTER EVER !!! We are having super cold winters in Long Island. It seems that frigid temps, heavy snow, icy rain and strong winds are the norm now and since my two feral cats got their new Kitty Tube, they are toasty warm and comfy in their new house. The Kitty Tube stays dry during heavy snow storms and heavy rains. As far as I am concerned, this is just the best product out there. This is an amazing item. I cannot thank you enough for such a fabulous product."
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have a stray cat that adopted us a few weeks ago. We are unable to let the little guy inside due to already having 3 indoor cats. This cat house had decent reviews (although it’s expensive) we splurged due to the unpredictable Montana weather so the little guy could have some shelter. It took a week (and rain) but he finally started using the cat house. No issues with leaking. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pettyolives

customer_reviews.title: Great design for Feral cat shelter
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my porch and some kitties use it. Very good in cold windy weather and look good. The perfect shape for one or 2 kitties to curl up in.
customer_reviews.author: The Desert CatMom

customer_reviews.title: Best cat house I've found!
customer_reviews.text: "What a great outdoor house for a kitty. We set this out in full weather conditions and our cat took to it immediately. We did need to bungee it to a post since it scooted across the deck in the wind when she was out of it. (She picked the spot where she wants to sleep!) It's the perfect answer for those looking for a safe, dry environment for their cat even if she wants to sleep out in the open weather rather than under an overhang or in the barn. This is the solution to several years of searching to keep her dry even in our Oregon rainstorms. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: The feral cats are using it.
customer_reviews.text: Outside cats 2 seem to like it their very skittish . I set it up in a covered area and saw them go in . So I say it's a win for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Paws up!
customer_reviews.text: We were extremely pleased with the Kitty tube. We was wondering what to do for the stray cat that kept showing up at our sliding glassdoor when the snow started to fly. "Spot", the white cat with a black tail and a black spot on his face has moved into the kitty tube and joins our in door cats for breakfast and dinner. Spot makes his rounds in the neighborhood before he retires in the kitty tube to avoid the cold and the winter weather. It truly has been a 5 paws up for the kiity tube as it provides a warm and dry home for our friend Spot.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Cozy little house!
customer_reviews.text: I received the item in fine shape ahead of the expected delivery date. There is little to do to set it up - hardest part is getting the little awning snapped in place. I've been feeding a small stray cat and hoping she will make use of the shelter and will take pictures when this is accomplished. The house is well insulated from top to bottom - actually a clever design that is weather proof and snug. I had been thinking of building a wooden structure but this was much easier and should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve seen for weather protection for cats
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of a hard time with the awning but am really glad I found this cat house. Best I’ve seen for cat shelter. The plastic flap needs to be more durable and made for weather protection and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but a very durable and well throughout kitty tube. I have 8 cats I'm helping take care of. They are 9 months old and it can only hold 2 of them at a time. The padded cushion is very flimsy. Could probably have done without at a lower price and just used something else. The awning falls off repeatedly with any pressure applied to it. And yes it is snapped in correctly. Can tell it was an afterthought to the design. Overall I like it but don't think it was worth anything near the asking price. It's basically a trash can with a door foam insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is everything they advertised it to be. I have ZERO issues on water getting inside even during a storm. My 13 pound porch cat just fits in the hole. I would like to have gotten the corded heating pad that was advertised on their website and am hoping they bring that back. The microwave thing is ok but it is bulky, which cuts down on the cat's comfort factor, and you have to keep taking it out and reheating heat.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Super good. Well made and insulated
customer_reviews.text: Super good. Well made and insulated. Sturdy and warm. My outdoor cats took to it immediately. I put it in my garage where they come and go through a pet door. I debated about one for any ferals hanging around, but with no escape door, I was not comfortable with the idea. The door opening is small. If the company decides to make a version with a back door, I will definitely purchase one for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten Abe

customer_reviews.title: Ya...no.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's awesome! My cats? Not so much. I've tried everything with no luck. They just won't use it. I should have known better. They're cats! They do what they want, when they want and only IF they want. So, I don't know where they go when the torrential Florida rains come or when it drops to 40F in the winter, but I do know it's NOT the Kitty Tube. On the upside, it does make a nice outdoor side table...
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Safe, warm and happy kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Stray kitty in the cold and dangerous Wisconsin winter with the polar vortex, not a good mix. I am so happy with my purchase of the Kitty Tube. I ordered the additional insulation which really makes house warm. I am happy knowing kitty is safe and warm. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking. Just bypass all the other homes on the market and buy this one! And I’m not one to rate products and give reviews but I really hope this may help someone else looking at buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and seems pretty secure and insulating. I use it for the outside cats. They immediately went in and seem to like it. But not just for cats. I also saw a baby raccoon, friend of my cat, go in one time. I wash the cushion inside regularly and dry it in the dryers. Fluffs right back up.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Fish

customer_reviews.title: Warm but let’s driving rain in...
customer_reviews.text: Well insulated. The cats love it. BUT, it is not design for driving rain (rain that comes in at an angle because of wind). The water is forced inside through the top vent and the side openings... I have been experimenting with tape to make sure of where the water was getting in. Now that I am sure. I’m going to get a fire bowl cover to put on top of the tube when it rains hard. It would be nice if it came with a cover that did that.
customer_reviews.author: Fran H

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered a third Kitty Tube - w/pillow - Jan. 2013
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received the cat house......it got through a very rainy day with no problems. I know the advertisement said it would hold 3 cats. My outdoor cats are not small cats so two would be the limit. And since they don't want to share, it looks like only one gets in at a time. Looking forward to receiving the second one. I have received the second one and the cats are enjoying both. Last week I ordered a third one. The cats won't share so each cat will have his own to feel cozy in. Very happy with this product. I think the cats are too!
customer_reviews.author: janeyann

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy and keeps predators away
customer_reviews.text: I have an outside cat and she loves this house. it is sturdy and keeps predators away. She had several litters and kept them all in this house. She has plenty of room inside and it keeps her from the elements. Great buy. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WAIT.  BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been adopted by a stray cat. I hope to turn him into an indoor cat but it is slow going so I wanted to give him shelter on my patio. He loves this house. I find him asleep in it every morning when I get up. It is beautifully constructed with much attention given to the details. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: PHOEBE'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised. Easy to install (especially if you watch the quick videos online). If putting together for warmth do not put on the optional handles/vents on the cap as they are a pain to take off again if you do not want the air vents open. I used to use a Dog Igloo but this is insulated and far superior and easy to put together. 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: BEST OUTDOOR CAT HOUSE EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last year, and it is a fantastic product. My cat loves her home. I have a heating pad set inside along with some soft blankets and it's actually hard to get my cat to come out. She loves it. Unfortunately our cat cannot remain inside any longer and this was the perfect solution. Don't look any further.. this is the best product out there. I can't wait to purchase the kitty tube round heater once it becomes available. Regarding customer service.. as others have mentioned their customer service is amazing. Yes, you really do get a live person and immediate feedback. I love this company and their people. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl and Sue Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the Kitty Tube from what I have experienced up to now!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Kitty tube to donate to PawsWatch which is an organization consisting of volunteers that do TNR (Trap, neuter and release). There is always a feral cat in need of a shelter and this is it! It arrived in record time and I could not believe how light weight it is. It appears to be very sturdy, well insulated and has a comfortable cushion inside which I know a tired kitty will appreciate. Once I hear back from PawsWatch on how it works out for them I will revisit my review.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: i like it but ridiculously overpriced
customer_reviews.text: i like it but ridiculously overpriced...parts probably cost about $50 bucks, but extremely convenient and great design. i am just not sure if the outside cat is sleeping in it yet...need to catch him in the act to be real satisfied especially when its real cold inside. i am meaning to put a non-chewable thermometer to see how actually warm it is inside as compared to outside cold temps.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Palmo

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative pet shelter
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice alternative shelter for an outdoor pet. However, I do not recommended this product for extreme climates. Your pet May freeze to death
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Galdamez

customer_reviews.title: Kitty tube
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what can I say it's fantastic! It was shipped almost the next day! My husband was unsure about it, but he helped me set it in place. However, the cats proved him wrong once again! (HA! HA!). I have at least eight strays, so I purchased two homes for them! My only problem is they all want to sleep in the same one. That's something they will have to work out among themselves! I'm really glad I didn't listen to the "old man" on this one! JUST LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zopp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the price. Very well made, sturdy heavy duty materials that will last years and years. The inner material will provide warmth in the winter and keep the house in cool in the summer. Insulated completely around, sides bottom and top. The outside material is well made. The unit is not heavy but well sealed and very sturdy. The awning and pillow are a nice addition for this cat house to keep out the rain and make it more comfortable for the kitties
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Have to check daily if you live in fire ant country.. must look like a mound to them!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately ants quickly got into box from tree stump I mounted it too so cat refused to use it. Kept interior dry during heavy rain. Donated it to local shelter and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Park Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if my cat was smaller to get through the entry. Something is using it but I'm not sure what since its in the barn. It's very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitty House!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Kitty House and very well insulated and made with great weatherproof materials and its earth friendly what more can you ask for. I bought it for a friend that takes in foster kittens and cats into her home and they love it. It is a wonderful invention and very practical good size house. The item came properly packaged and on time. I recommend this product highly and it is a very durable kitty house that will last a long time. Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This shelter is awesome - I have it tucked into the corner foliage on my porch so that it is virtually invisible to any but the cat that uses it. So far he uses it as a safe place to eat; and I'm hoping that as the weather turns this winter he will seek it out as shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is out second Kitty Tube due to growing number of feral cats outside my backyard. Because, these tubes cats are staying more often. It gave me a chances to get closer to cats. There are about 4-5 kitties are using them. These are the best thing for Colorado weather. (Note: I now spayed two girls and trying to catch momma haha)
customer_reviews.author: Sue

product_meta.title: Kitty Tube The Outdoor Insulated Cat House w/Pet Pillow
product_meta.description:
The Kitty Tube Gen. 3 – Fully insulated outdoor cat house with custom pet pillow The Kitty Tube includes an awning with gasket over the main door opening with a clear removable flap door. - A vent cap on the lid to remove moisture laden air that causes condensation. -A Scratch Guard and moisture resistant interior surface that won't harbor mold, mildew, bacteria, or cat spray/urine. -A vapor barrier interior to reduce condensation. -Awnings over the top handle/ventilation holes so they can be left open in the rain/snow. -A slightly elevated bottom with a drainage system. -Easy to remove insulation that will lay flat for easier cleaning. 
The Kitty Tube has a removable top lid, is seamless in construction and is environmentally friendly due to the post consumer recycled content. The one piece construction provides a smooth interior which is easily cleaned with a simple spray of the garden hose. The dome lid keeps your pet dry in even the heaviest of rains and with the included machine washable custom pet pillow, the Kitty Tube will provide your pet a safe, secure and dry home. The geometric shape resists wind and is naturally preferred by cats. 
The Kitty Tube provides a safe, economical and maintenance free shelter for your pet. Designed for outdoor use, The Kitty Tube is fully insulated to be ultra warm in the winter. 
The unique one door design provides easy passage for your cat but will not allow predators like dogs or coyotes to get to your cat. The Kitty Tube also creates a safe and secure haven for your cat to give birth. 
All Kitty Tube items returned in UNUSED condition, within the 30 day return period, will have a restocking fee of 20% of purchase price. All Kitty Tube items returned in USED condition, within the 30 day return period, will have a restocking fee of 30% of purchase price. Kitty Tube DOES NOT accept returns beyond 30 days of purchase.
feature_bullets: The Kitty Tube Gen. 3 –Outdoor insulated cat house with custom pet pillow."The Kitty Tube is Guaranteed to keep the weather out" The Kitty Tube is simply the highest quality, best insulated outdoor cat house on the market today!

Comes with awnings and removable clear flap door. The Kitty Tube provides an economical, safe and secure home for up to 3 cats. The Kitty Tube's unique door design will also protect your cat from predators. Alley Cat Allies and Feral Fixers Approved.

The Kitty Tube includes a custom, machine washable pet bed on top of the fully insulated floor. The floor, walls, and roof are all insulated with a high quality, high R value insulation. The Kitty Tube will stay cool in the summer, and is ultra warm in the winter. Also available in FERAL OPTION - Straw Only. (See separate listing)
The built in lifting handles can be adjusted to supply full flow through ventilation for the summer, and can be closed to retain heat in the winter.

The Kitty Tube is environmentally friendly, made from post consumer recycled content, and is proudly MADE IN THE USA. Purchasing Kitty Tube products supports many American businesses and their families. The Kitty Tube shell is guaranteed for life to never chip, crack, or fade. See our website for instructional videos to install Kitty Tube accessories.

specifications.Manufacturer: Keg A Tube & Kitty Tube LLC
